summary.span: 表示 WQL *ASSOCIATORS OF* 資料查詢。

span.span: Represents a WQL *ASSOCIATORS OF* data query.

summary.span: 它可以用於執行個體 (Instance) 和結構描述 (Schema) 查詢。

span.span: It can be used for both instances and schema queries.

summary.span: 如果指定字串可以成功剖析為 WQL 查詢，則視為查詢字串，否則會假設其為查詢的來源物件路徑。

span.span: If the specified string can be successfully parsed as a WQL query, it is considered to be the query string; otherwise, it is assumed to be the path of the source object for the query.

summary.span: 在這個狀況中，查詢會假設為執行個體查詢。

span.span: In this case, the query is assumed to be an instance query.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出對於符合查詢的所有執行個體來說，只有其類別定義會傳回。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating that for all instances that adhere to the query, only their class definitions be returned.

summary.span: 這個參數只對執行個體查詢有效。

span.span: This parameter is only valid for instance queries.

value.span: 傳回 值，指出對於符合查詢的所有執行個體來說，只會傳回其類別定義。

span.span: Returns a value indicating that for all instances that adhere to the query, only their class definitions are to be returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的旗標。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new flag. ## 屬性值Property Value `true` 如果查詢要求的結果集; 的唯一類別定義，否則， `false`。`true` if the query requests only class definitions of the result set; otherwise, `false`. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的來源物件。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new source object. ## 屬性值Property Value 字串，表示要用來查詢物件的路徑。A string representing the path of the object to be used for the query. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ThisRole { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定來源物件應該在關係性中扮演的角色。

span.span: Gets or sets the role that the source object should be playing in the relationship.

value.span: 傳回 值，包含此物件的角色。

span.span: Returns a value containing the role of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定此屬性值會覆寫先前儲存在物件中的任何值。Setting this property value overrides any previous value stored in the object. 查詢字串會重建以反映新的角色。The query string is rebuilt to reflect the new role. ## 屬性值Property Value 字串，包含這個物件的角色。A string containing the role of this object. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
